div.p: The original developers of the Wilde Trials International News Archive are Colette Colligan, Michael Joyce, Sarah Bull, and Cécile Loyen. Development of the database and its applications began in 2014 and has continued collaboratively since.
The archive is affiliated with SFU’s Digital Humanities Innovation Lab and Transfopress, and operates out of Simon Fraser University Library.

It has received generous support from Canada's Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council Insight Grant program (2020-2023) and has benefitted from a fellowship at the Paris Institute for Advanced Study, with the financial support of the French State, and its program “Investissements d’avenir” managed by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche (ANR-11-LABX-0027-01 Labex RFIEA+).
